title: Bug 130068[Regression]Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when preview a report with parameter.
description: Description: Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when previewing a report with a parameter.
OB: When previewing a report that contains a parameter, the Report Parameter window does not pop up.
EB: The Report Parameter window should pop up when previewing a report that contains a parameter.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a new report parameter without a default value. 2. Drag the parameter to the Layout. 3. Preview the report.
